content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or preferences, but here are some of the best hand creams or lotions that are highly recommended by experts and users:

1. Neutrogena Norwegian Formula Hand Cream
2. Kiehl's Ultimate Strength Hand Salve
3. Aveeno Intense Relief Hand Cream
4. L'Occitane Shea Butter Hand Cream
5. CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream
6. Burt's Bees Almond Milk Hand Cream
7. O'Keeffe's Working Hands Cream

Remember, it's essential to choose a hand cream or lotion that is formulated for your skin type and has hydrating ingredients like glycerin, shea butter, or hyaluronic acid to keep your hands soft and nourished.
